title: just looking for people over 20 for friends
body: i'm 23 just looking for friends that are older also that enjoy playing for fun and having a good time, if you skype that'd be cool, or if you are from colorado that'd be even cooler. i play every role really enjoy jungling and top, but if any of you are looking for friends also add "tinytree68" i know i'm bronze 4 but this is for people that just like to have fun and enjoy the game. i'm not a stupid person either. i know the game. just make little to no effort to climb out
